title: Complimentary Recycling Strengthens Circular Plastics Economy - PlasticsToday
summary: Governments are taking action to reduce plastic waste. Advanced recycling technologies can help, but collaboration between all parts of the waste management system is also needed to achieve a plastics circular economy. Chemical recycling is a promising technology that can process more of the plastics that cannot be recycled through established channels, but it needs to be combined with mechanical recycling and consumer education to be effective.
green_innovation: TRUE, because it contributes to environmental sustainability goals such as reducing plastic waste and conserving natural resources by developing a circular economy for plastics.
business_innovation: TRUE, because it introduces a new or improved product (advanced recycling technology) that differs significantly from the firm's previous products and processes and has been brought into use by the firm.
green_product: FALSE, because the article doesn't describe a specific product.
green_process: TRUE, because it describes a process (advanced recycling) that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability by reducing waste, conserving natural resources, and decreasing energy consumption.

title: Recycle Track Systems announces acquisition of Cycle Technology - PR Newswire
summary: Recycle Track Systems (RTS) has acquired the assets of Cycle Technology, Inc., including its reverse vending machine (RVM) technology and recycling rewards platform. RTS provides waste management solutions to professional sports teams, helping them reduce emissions and waste. Cycle's technology will allow RTS to expand its recycling engagement programs through gamification and rewards.
green_innovation: TRUE, Cycle's reverse vending machine technology encourages recycling and reduces waste, contributing to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE, Cycle's reverse vending machine technology is a new and improved product that differs significantly from previous recycling methods, offering a gamified and rewarding recycling experience.
green_product: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific product.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific process.
